name: Knit or Stick Acorns
description: Hooray! Now just like in Goldilocks and the Three Bears this pattern comes in 3 sizes. There is a Big Papa Acorn, a Medium Mama Acorn and a Teeny-Tiny Baby Acorn! I knit my medium and large acorns in worsted and my small in sock. They are all knit in the round, on dpns.
suggested_yarn: Patons North America Classic Wool Worsted
full_text: Hooray! Now just like in Goldilocks and the Three Bears this pattern comes in 3 sizes. There is a Big Papa Acorn, a Medium Mama Acorn and a Teeny-Tiny Baby Acorn! I knit my medium and large acorns in worsted and my small in sock. They are all knit in the round, on dpns. I hope you enjoy this free pattern! Happy Knitting Natasha Praise for Knit or Stick Acorns The pattern is simple and wonderful! (thrsedge) Really quick and easy. Cute. (Elemenopeo) These acorns look like real acorns. (Saphiera) Fast little acorn! (bonewoman) Quick, easy and cute! Love them! (MinniStitcher) Cute tiny acorn only took a few yards of stash yarn and a few minutes to knit! (Bogwoppit)
